item.description:
"Souper Supper" Linda and Ralph will host our monthly meeting with a wintertime dinner of soup to start. At this meeting, we plan our upcoming calendar of events, including our major events like the Anniversary Brunch in February and the Steak Out in June. Dinner starts at 6:30 in Middletown. Because this event is in a private home, you must be in touch with the host for more information, including directions and what you can contribute to the potluck dinner.
http://socialnetwork....
item.name: Monthly potluck dinner and business meeting
